DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see two new malaria vaccine call FMP1 RTSS , combine adjuvant ( call SBAS2 ) help stimulate body 's immune system , safe , demonstrate immune response blood test , lastly , see vaccines prevent malaria infection . The RTS , S vaccine contain malaria protein combination portion commercially available hepatitis B vaccine . The FMP1 vaccine also contain malaria protein . The adjuvant call SBAS2 , special oil water emulsion . Vaccinations do study day 0 , 28 84 , follow malaria challenge approximately 14 day 3rd vaccination .
